column4: anyone here have a clue why apt-get update won't work in my dapper install?
vox: no, it's a fresh install, just finished it...how long will the servers be down?
us mirrors are not as good as others.
gksudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list and pastebin the file
you see all the lines with us.archive?
save than close it let me know when done
they are the first to get updated and 99% of time are online where as us is online 50% of time
hmm..maybe i just have a problem with the internal network..same errors
you got same errors after saving and running sudo apt-get update?
restart and see if it helps
mk, sorry to have wasted your time...
